Deathtouch, reach, haste
[i]Scavenger[/i] – When Shinon, Deadly Adept enters, draw three cards, then discard two cards, then Forge.
[i]Deadly Adept[/i] – Equipped creatures you control have deathtouch.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if Shinon dealt 5 or more damage this turn, transform him.
